elements.title: Wellbee
elements.contents: ... that in the 1960s, the Centers for Disease Control's Wellbee (pictured) encouraged Americans to get vaccinated against polio and diphtheria?

elements.title: Andi Sudirman Sulaiman
elements.contents: ... that Andi Sudirman Sulaiman made it mandatory for Muslim civil servants to read the Quran before work?

elements.title: Red Ghost
elements.contents: ... that according to legend, the Red Ghost stomped a woman to death, and killed and ate a grizzly bear?

elements.title: David Flitcroft
elements.contents: ... that David Flitcroft was appointed as director of football at Port Vale after initially applying to be the club's manager?

elements.title: a 2019 truck crash
elements.contents: ... that the driver in a 2019 truck crash received a sentence of 110 years in prison due to mandatory sentencing laws in Colorado?

elements.title: Rudi Kappel
elements.contents: ... that Rudi Kappel, co-founder of the first airline of Suriname, was arrested both on entering and leaving Santiago de Cuba?

elements.title: The Alignment Problem
elements.contents: ... that The Alignment Problem, a book discussing existential risk from AI, was one of five "books that inspired Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella" in 2021?

elements.title: Thomas Davey
elements.contents: ... that Thomas Davey was part of a florists' cult?
